docs.snippet: CHICAGO, Aug. 1 (UP)--Ed (Porky) Oliver, who hasn't won a tournament in more than a year, took a one-stroke lead in the men's professional division of Tam o' Shanter's "All-American" golf tournament with a sixunder-par 66 today.
docs.lead_paragraph: CHICAGO, Aug. 1 (UP)--Ed (Porky) Oliver, who hasn't won a tournament in more than a year, took a one-stroke lead in the men's professional division of Tam o' Shanter's "All-American" golf tournament with a sixunder-par 66 today.

headline.main: Oliver Cards 66 to Lead Men's Pro Division as All-American Golf Starts; CASPER, WITH 67, SECOND IN CHICAGO Trails Oliver by One Stroke --Beverly Hanson and Fay Crocker Leaders at 71 Good Chips, Approaches Three Register 74's

docs.snippet: CHICAGO, Aug. 2 (AP)--Roberto de Vicenzo, 34, of Argentina, missed the Tam o' Shanter course record by a stroke today with an eight-under-par 64 and took the halfway lead in the men's professional division of the All-American golf tournament.
docs.lead_paragraph: CHICAGO, Aug. 2 (AP)--Roberto de Vicenzo, 34, of Argentina, missed the Tam o' Shanter course record by a stroke today with an eight-under-par 64 and took the halfway lead in the men's professional division of the All-American golf tournament.

headline.main: De Vicenzo Cards 64 for 133 to Pace All-American Golf at Halfway Mark; MEXICO CITY PRO AHEAD BY 2 SHOTS De Vicenzo Chicago Leader, With Casper Next at 135 --Harney Totals 136

docs.snippet: F. Briggs Dalzell has been elected president of the Newark Towing Corporation in a reorganization move designed to adopt the company's operations to expanded shipping activity in the Newark and Port Newark areas.

docs.snippet: CHICAGO, Aug. 9 (AP)--Sam Snead showed his heels to the awed younger pros today with a second-round 69 and a sizzling halfway total of 134 to maintain his lead in golf's biggest money tournament.
docs.lead_paragraph: CHICAGO, Aug. 9 (AP)--Sam Snead showed his heels to the awed younger pros today with a second-round 69 and a sizzling halfway total of 134 to maintain his lead in golf's biggest money tournament.

headline.main: SNEAD KEEPS LEAD IN GOLF WITH 134; Second-Round 69 in 'World' Event Puts Him 2 Shots Ahead of Balding

docs.snippet: Seven weeks ago last Thursday the United Nations made public the damning indictment returned against the Government of Russia by a special committee on the problem of Hungary. Members of this committee came from Denmark, Australia, Ceylon, Tunisia...
docs.lead_paragraph: Seven weeks ago last Thursday the United Nations made public the damning indictment returned against the Government of Russia by a special committee on the problem of Hungary. Members of this committee came from Denmark, Australia, Ceylon, Tunisia and Uruguay. They were a fair cross section of the free world with the great powers left out.
